title: 462. The Future of New York City Is in Question. Could Andrew Yang Be the Answer?
description: The man who wants America to “think harder” has parlayed his quixotic presidential campaign into front-runner status in New York’s mayoral election. And he has some big plans.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The man who wants America to “think harder” has parlayed his quixotic presidential campaign into front-runner status in New York’s mayoral election. And he has some big plans.
